citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45 on
07-OCT-16.
Inspector arrived at the facility based on the optimal hours previously provided. Waited one half hour and
attempted to call the number on file but was unable to get through.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:45 on
07-OCT-16.
     Inspector arrived at the facility based on the optimal hours previously provided. Waited one half hour and
attempted to call the number on file but was unable to get through.
